channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.description: :penguin: 使用Github發佈Hugo網頁全記錄 Content [toc] A few thoughts Static site generator Hugo / Jekyll Hugo: command line 自動生網頁，有幾種安裝方法 Pre-built binaries Through package manager $\leftarrow$ current method Step1: Install Chocolatey Windows原來都可以裝Package Manager $\rightarrow$ 隨便選了Chocolatey My first package manger in Windows :) Install: 用Windows內建PowerShell (admin) Run Get-ExecutionPolicy $\rightarrow$ if it returns restricted, run Set-ExecutionPolicy AllSigned Run Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.
